title: Life with Bingo
description: Leaving behind an abusive home, a sixteen-year-old boy and his best friend set out to find their place in the world. Come tag along as the two endure hardships, experience the kindness of strangers and come to realize that perhaps there are no coincidences in life. Uniquely told from the perspective of both, Life with Bingo provides readers an endearing look at the very special bond between a boy and his dog. When finished, you may never view our canine friends the same way again.
author: Jim  Black
